hero.title: Descopera comenzile MoonLand
hero.description: Ghid interactiv pentru toate comenzile esentiale de pe serverul MoonLand. Exploreaza, colaboreaza si protejeaza-ti baza cu usurinta.

guide.title: Cum folosesti comenzile in siguranta
guide.description: Parcurge pasii de mai jos pentru a te familiariza cu mecanicile principale ale serverului in mai putin de cinci minute.

steps.title: Verifica regulile
steps.summary: Ruleaza comanda /rules pentru a evita sanctiunile inutile.

steps.title: Protejeaza constructiile
steps.summary: Stabileste claim si ofera acces partenerilor de echipa.

steps.title: Optimizeaza economia
steps.summary: Monitorizeaza balanta, joburile si comerciantii globali.

catalog.title: Catalog complet

categories.title: Baza si navigare
categories.summary: Comenzi uzuale pentru teleportare si plasarea punctelor de interes.

commands.label: /spawn
commands.description: Teleporteaza direct catre punctul central al hub-ului.

commands.label: /sethome
commands.description: Memoreaza locatia curenta pentru intoarceri rapide.

commands.label: /home
commands.description: Revine la unul dintre punctele salvate cu /sethome.

commands.label: /tpa
commands.description: Trimite o cerere de teleportare catre un alt jucator.

commands.label: /tpaccept
commands.description: Confirma cererea de teleportare primita.

commands.label: /ignore
commands.description: Blocheaza mesajele unui jucator individual.

categories.title: Economia serverului
categories.summary: Monitorizeaza balanta, licitatiile si venituri suplimentare.

commands.label: /bal
commands.description: Afiseaza balanta curenta.

commands.label: /pay
commands.description: Transfera rapid monede altor jucatori.

commands.label: /shop
commands.description: Deschide magazinul global cu obiecte utile.

commands.label: /ah
commands.description: Acceseaza casa de licitatii pentru schimburi intre jucatori.

commands.label: /jobs browse
commands.description: Afiseaza lista joburilor active pentru venit pasiv.

commands.label: /baltop
commands.description: Clasament al celor mai bogati jucatori.

categories.title: Protectie teren
categories.summary: Gestioneaza claim-urile si drepturile de acces.

commands.label: /claim
commands.description: Revendica zona curenta pentru protectie.

commands.label: /trust
commands.description: Ofera acces unui jucator in claim-ul tau.

commands.label: /untrust
commands.description: Revoca accesul unui jucator in claim.

commands.label: /claimslist
commands.description: Listeaza toate terenurile revendicate de tine.

commands.label: /abandonclaim
commands.description: Elibereaza terenul curent.

commands.label: /map
commands.description: Deschide harta web pentru vizualizarea revindicarii.

categories.title: Social si comunitate
categories.summary: Ramai conectat cu echipa si evenimentele comunitatii.

commands.label: /discord
commands.description: Primeste invitatia catre serverul oficial Discord.

commands.label: /vote
commands.description: Voteaza MoonLand si colecteaza recompense periodice.

commands.label: /daily
commands.description: Obtine bonusul zilnic de activitate.

commands.label: /mail send
commands.description: Trimite un mesaj unui jucator offline.

commands.label: /nickname
commands.description: Actualizeaza supranumele afisat.

commands.label: /msg
commands.description: Conversatie privata intre doi jucatori.

catalog.subtitle: Comenzi uzuale pentru teleportare si plasarea punctelor de interes.
catalog.description: Comenzi uzuale pentru teleportare si plasarea punctelor de interes.

tips.title: Recomandari rapide
items: Pastreaza un home aproape de spawn pentru intoarcere rapida.
Organizeaza-ti kiturile economice pentru a profita de joburi.
Noteaza coordonatele bazelor in cartea personala.
Foloseste claims mici si precise pentru optimizarea resurselor.

items.question: Cum intru pe server?
items.answer: Adauga IP-ul moonland.ro in lista de servere si conecteaza-te. Pe Bedrock foloseste portul 19132.

items.question: Ce versiuni sunt suportate?
items.answer: Serverul accepta editie Java moderna si cateva versiuni anterioare. Recomandam ultima versiune stabila.

items.question: Cum raportez o problema?
items.answer: Acceseaza Discord si deschide un ticket in canalul de suport cu detalii si dovezi.

hero.title: Discover MoonLand commands
hero.description: Interactive guide for all essential commands on the MoonLand server. Explore, collaborate, and protect your base with ease.

guide.title: How to use the commands safely
guide.description: Follow the steps below to learn the main server mechanics in under five minutes.

steps.title: Protect your builds
steps.summary: Set claims and grant access to teammates.

steps.title: Optimize the economy
steps.summary: Monitor balance, jobs, and global merchants.

catalog.title: Complete catalog

categories.title: Base and navigation
categories.summary: Common commands for teleportation and waypoints.

commands.label: /spawn
commands.description: Teleport directly to the central hub.

commands.label: /sethome
commands.description: Save the current location for quick returns.

commands.label: /home
commands.description: Go back to one of the saved homes.

commands.label: /tpa
commands.description: Send a teleport request to another player.

commands.label: /tpaccept
commands.description: Accept a received teleport request.

commands.label: /ignore
commands.description: Block messages from a specific player.

categories.title: Server economy
categories.summary: Track balances, auctions, and extra income.

commands.label: /bal
commands.description: Show your current balance.

commands.label: /pay
commands.description: Send coins to other players.

commands.label: /shop
commands.description: Open the global shop with useful items.

commands.label: /ah
commands.description: Access the auction house for trades.

commands.label: /jobs browse
commands.description: Display the list of active jobs.

commands.label: /baltop
commands.description: Leaderboard of the richest players.

commands.label: /claim
commands.description: Claim the current area for protection.

commands.label: /trust
commands.description: Grant a player access to your claim.

commands.label: /untrust
commands.description: Remove a player's access from the claim.

commands.label: /claimslist
commands.description: List all claims you own.

commands.label: /abandonclaim
commands.description: Release the current claim.

commands.label: /map
commands.description: Open the web map to view claims.

categories.title: Social and community
categories.summary: Stay connected with the team and events.

commands.label: /discord
commands.description: Get the invite to the official Discord.

commands.label: /vote
commands.description: Vote for MoonLand and earn periodic rewards.

commands.label: /daily
commands.description: Claim the daily activity bonus.

commands.label: /mail send
commands.description: Send a message to an offline player.

commands.label: /nickname
commands.description: Update the displayed nickname.

commands.label: /msg
commands.description: Private conversation between two players.

catalog.subtitle: Common commands for teleportation and placing points of interest.
catalog.description: Common commands for teleportation and placing points of interest.

tips.title: Quick recommendations
items: Keep a home close to spawn for quick return.
Organize your economic kits to take advantage of jobs.
Write down base coordinates in your personal book.
Use small and precise claims to optimize resources.

items.question: How do I join the server?
items.answer: Add moonland.ro to the multiplayer list and connect. On Bedrock use port 19132.

items.question: Which versions are supported?
items.answer: The server supports modern Java edition plus some previous versions. We recommend the latest stable one.

items.question: How do I report an issue?
items.answer: Join Discord and open a support ticket with details and evidence.
